name: Wanted: Gunslinger's Kiss
summary: Your life as a promising young deputy in a wild land inhabited by giant monsters and dangerous outlaws takes an unexpected turn when you're framed for murder while on your first field assignment. Before long, you've been captured by the most infamous group of mercenaries in the land—the Lazarus Gang, who are eager to claim the price on your head. On the way to turn you in, however, you realize that these outlaws aren't the evil men you expected… and they discover that you're a bounty unlike any other.
